cu.explanation_en: Setting the RLC log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing error and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RF simulator model name to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing error and prevent the DU from initializing the simulator properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RF 模擬器模型名稱設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致配置解析錯誤，並阻止 DU 正確初始化模擬器。
